error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'car_payment_for_utilities_calc' (250.0) was used instead of 'groceries_cost' (50.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 550
His utilities cost 1/2 the amount of his $250 car payment so his utilities cost 250/2 = $<<250/2=125>>125
All total, his bills cost him 775+250+125+250 = $<<775+250+125+250=1400>>1400
He makes $2500 a month and his bills cost $1400 a month so that leaves him with 2500-1400 = $<<2500-1400=1100>>1100
He wants to put half of $1100 into a retirement account so he will invest 1100/2= $<<1100/2=550>>550 into his retirement account
He had 1100 and puts $550 into his retirement account so that leaves him with 1100-550 = $<<1100-550=550>>550 remaining
